name: geshifile (joomla-mambot)
short_description: geshifile is a mambot for the CMS-System Joomla, which allows the user to display uploaded code-files via joomla-inbuilt geshi. The Difference to the inbuilt-Geshi-Mambot is the following: the code can exist in a separat file, what is more comfortable
